translated: As long as one definitely circles one‚Äôs body, one will see the light of the cakra.

original: zla ba drug gis reg bya dang bral mnyam pa'i bde ba sdom brtson rnams kyi lam sems 'gyur //
analyzed: zla ba drug gis reg bya dang bral mnyam pa'i bde ba sdom brtson rnams kyi lam sems 'gyur //
translated: In six months, the bliss of the union of the two organs, the path of the ascetics, the transformation of the mind.

original: chags dang chags bral mtha' thog son pa'i skad cig la yang khyab bdag rlung gi grangs ni 'phel //
analyzed: chags dang chags bral mtha' thog son pa'i skad cig la yang khyab bdag rlung gi grangs ni 'phel //
translated: In the moment of the end of passion and of the end of detachment, the number of the all-pervading winds increases.

original: aotta 'bar ba'i bar du khyad par dga' dang lhan skyes dag ni ye shes rnam shes dbus //
analyzed: aotta 'bar ba'i bar du khyad par dga' dang lhan skyes dag ni ye shes rnam shes dbus //
translated: From the navel to the flame of the uvula, the special joy and the innate are the consciousness of wisdom.

original: gnyid log gnyid yur mtshams su rdo rje padma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor bas bde ba gang //
analyzed: gnyid log gnyid yur mtshams su rdo rje padma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor bas bde ba gang //
translated: The bliss of the union of the two vajras and lotuses at the end of sleep and the beginning of waking

original: de ni 'phel bar rab bya bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang las 'dir ni 'phel la ngo mtshar med //
analyzed: de ni 'phel bar rab bya bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang las 'dir ni 'phel la ngo mtshar med //
translated: is to be increased by the rite of the guru's initiation. There is no wonder in its increase.

original: nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag po la 'jug lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor mchog / ces gsungs so //
analyzed: nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag po la 'jug lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor mchog / ces gsungs so //
translated: Having conquered the demon of the afflictions, the supreme yoga enters the lord of victors by the rite of the year.

original: dri ma med pa'i 'od las kyang /
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i 'od las kyang /
translated: And in the Vimalaprabha:

original: chags pa byang chub kyi sems kyi dkar po'i phyogs cha bco lnga'o //
analyzed: chags pa byang chub kyi sems kyi dkar po'i phyogs cha bco lnga'o //
translated: The fifteen parts of the bright fortnight are passion, the bodhisattva spirit.

original: chags bral nag po'i phyogs kyi cha bco lnga'o //
analyzed: chags bral nag po'i phyogs kyi cha bco lnga'o //
translated: The fifteen parts of the dark side, which is free from passion.

original: de'i dbus su lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba cha bcu drug pa khams thams cad kyi yang dag par sdud pa 'dus pa dang sngom pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: de'i dbus su lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba cha bcu drug pa khams thams cad kyi yang dag par sdud pa 'dus pa dang sngom pa'o zhes so //
translated: In the middle of that, the sixteenth part, which is the innate joy, is the gathering and the union of all the elements.

original: rdo rje skyil krung g-yon dang g-yas pa'i bu gar rgyu ba chad pas rdzogs sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rtse mor gnas pa gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung g-yon dang g-yas pa'i bu gar rgyu ba chad pas rdzogs sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rtse mor gnas pa gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: The perfect Buddha, who abides at the tip of the vajra, is just so, by the cessation of the movement of the right and left channels in the vajra posture.

original: sangs rgyas yang dag par brjod pa khams gsum du khyab pa'i gzhom du med pa'i sgra'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yang dag par brjod pa khams gsum du khyab pa'i gzhom du med pa'i sgra'o //
translated: The perfect Buddha is the indestructible sound that pervades the three worlds.

original: de nyid chos de de 'dzin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas yang dag @78a * //üîΩbrjod pa'i chos 'dzin no //
analyzed: de nyid chos de de 'dzin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas yang dag @78a * // brjod pa'i chos 'dzin no //
translated: He is the perfect Buddha because he holds that Dharma.

original: yang na sku gsung thugs ye shes kyi thig le 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: yang na sku gsung thugs ye shes kyi thig le 'dzin pa ste /
translated: Or, he holds the bindu of gnosis of body, speech, and mind.üîΩAs it is said:

original: rdo rje skyil krung las sems ni //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung las sems ni //
translated: The mind, from the vajra posture,

original: nor bu'i nang du son par blta //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nor bu'i nang du son par blta // zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is seen to enter the jewel.

original: sangs rgyas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The perfect Buddha is the nonconceptual gnosis of the Buddha.

original: de nyid nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi dri mas ma gos pa'i phyir dang / bde ba chen po'i rnam pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi dri mas ma gos pa'i phyir dang / bde ba chen po'i rnam pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is not soiled by the stain of the latent impressions of the afflictions, and because it is the form of great bliss,

original: padma phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: padma phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: it is the great seal of the lotus.

original: de las skyes pas na sangs rgyas padma skyes so //
analyzed: de las skyes pas na sangs rgyas padma skyes so //
translated: Because it is born from that, the Buddha is the lotus-born.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dpal ldan no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dpal ldan no //
translated: For that very reason, he is glorious.

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid rang gis rig par bya ba'i ye shes ni kun mkhyen ye shes so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid rang gis rig par bya ba'i ye shes ni kun mkhyen ye shes so //
translated: The knowledge of the nature of all things, which is to be known by oneself, is the knowledge of the Omniscient One.

original: de nyid mdzod de chos thams cad de'i nang du chud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid mdzod de chos thams cad de'i nang du chud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That itself is the treasury, because all things are contained within it.

original: de 'dzin pas na kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He is the holder of the knowledge of the Omniscient One's treasury, because he holds that.

original: ye shes kyi snang ba nyid kyis mdzes pas na rgyal po'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi snang ba nyid kyis mdzes pas na rgyal po'o //
translated: He is the king, because he is beautiful with the light of knowledge itself.

original: ba'i rnam pa'i steng du rdul ba'i shad tsheg drag gi ngo bo zla ba phyed pa'i steng gi thig le'i rang bzhin bde ba byang chub kyi sems gzhom du med pa'i ngo bo n'a da dang ldan ba sna tshogs te sgyu 'phrul 'dod yon lnga nye bar longs
analyzed: ba'i rnam pa'i steng du rdul ba'i shad tsheg drag gi ngo bo zla ba phyed pa'i steng gi thig le'i rang bzhin bde ba byang chub kyi sems gzhom du med pa'i ngo bo n'a da dang ldan ba sna tshogs te sgyu 'phrul 'dod yon lnga nye bar longs
translated: The syllable ‚Äúha‚Äù is the nature of the indestructible bindu of bodhicitta, endowed with the nature of the half-moon.üîΩüîΩThe syllable ‚Äúna‚Äù is the nature of the bindu at the tip of the half-moon, endowed with the nature of the indestructible bindu of bodhicitta.üîΩ

original: spyod pa la sogs pa'i tshul 'dzin pa ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: spyod pa la sogs pa'i tshul 'dzin pa ni de bzhin no //
translated: The various means of enjoyment of the five sense objects of the magical net, etc., are just as they are.

original: sangs rgyas rig sngags thig le bzhi'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas na sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rig sngags thig le bzhi'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas na sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang ba'o //
translated: The Buddha is the bearer of the knowledge-mantra, because he holds the nature of the four drops of the knowledge-mantra of the Buddha.

original: de nyid kyi phyir che ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir che ba'o //
translated: Therefore, he is great.

original: smin mtshams su son pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir rdo rje rnon po'o //
analyzed: smin mtshams su son pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir rdo rje rnon po'o //
translated: He is the sharp vajra, because he is the nature of the innate intuition, which is the essence of the freedom from impurity, which is located between the eyebrows.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa gcod pa'i phyir ral gri che'o //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa gcod pa'i phyir ral gri che'o //
translated: He is the great sword, because he cuts off discursive thought by the nature of the natural outflow of that.

original: rnam par smin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir yi ge mchog ste'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir yi ge mchog ste'o //
translated: The supreme syllable is because all phenomena are of one taste in the nature of the fully ripened.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir rnam par dag go //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir rnam par dag go //
translated: It is pure because of the nature of the person.

original: theg pa chen po'i lam gyi bden pa des sdug bsngal gcod pa gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i lam gyi bden pa des sdug bsngal gcod pa gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: It is just so because of the truth of the MahƒÅyƒÅna path, which cuts off suffering.

original: rdo rje chos ye shes kyi chos te de nyid mtshon cha chen po gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje chos ye shes kyi chos te de nyid mtshon cha chen po gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: It is the great weapon of the vajra Dharma, which is the wisdom Dharma.

original: rdo rje yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi zab mo gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi zab mo gzung ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: It is the vajra, which is the nature of the wisdom that is free from the concepts of apprehending and so on, which is the profound true nature.

original: dzi na mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rgyal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i nges pa'i tshig gi dzi na dzi ka ste /
analyzed: dzi na mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rgyal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i nges pa'i tshig gi dzi na dzi ka ste /
translated: Jina is Ak·π£obhya and so on, because of being victorious.

original: dri ma dang bral ba snang ba med pa'i sems khong du chud pa'i ngo bo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dri ma dang bral ba snang ba med pa'i sems khong du chud pa'i ngo bo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The definitive meaning of jina is the essence of the mind that is free from stains and free from appearances.

original: rdo rje'i @78b lam mi 'dzag pa nyid kyis rdo rje blo gros so /
analyzed: rdo rje'i @78b lam mi 'dzag pa nyid kyis rdo rje blo gros so /
translated: Vajra-intellect, because of the non-emission of the vajra path.

original: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gsal bar gyur pas don bzhin rig go //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gsal bar gyur pas don bzhin rig go //
translated: Intellect-like-a-wish-fulfilling-gem, because of the manifestation of the nature of the fruit.

original: sngar ye shes kyi tshogs bshad nas /
analyzed: sngar ye shes kyi tshogs bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the accumulation of wisdom,

original: da ni bsod nams kyi tshogs brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni bsod nams kyi tshogs brjod par bya ste /
translated: now, the accumulation of merit should be explained.

original: sngar bshad pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnams rdzogs par byed pas pha rol tu phyin pa kun rdzogs pa'o //üîΩsngar bshad pa'i sa'i rgyan gyi phyir /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnams rdzogs par byed pas pha rol tu phyin pa kun rdzogs pa'o // sngar bshad pa'i sa'i rgyan gyi phyir /
translated: The perfection of all perfections, because of the completion of the perfections of generosity and so on, as previously explained.

original: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan no //
analyzed: sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan no //
translated: The ornament of all stages, because of the ornament of the stages, as previously explained.

original: rnam par dag pa'i chos sogs rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdag med chos snang ba med par byed pa chos nyid kyi ngo bo rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i chos sogs rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdag med chos snang ba med par byed pa chos nyid kyi ngo bo rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The stage of the pure Dharma, because of the realization of the characteristics of the pure Dharma, and because of the non-appearance of the Dharma of selflessness, which is the essence of reality, naturally luminous.

original: des yang dag par skyed pa yang dag ye shes zla ba lhan skyes kyi dga' ba'i zla ba de yi 'od bzang bde ba chen po'i rnam pa gang gi yin pa de de ltar bshad do //
analyzed: des yang dag par skyed pa yang dag ye shes zla ba lhan skyes kyi dga' ba'i zla ba de yi 'od bzang bde ba chen po'i rnam pa gang gi yin pa de de ltar bshad do //
translated: That which is generated by that is the moon of correct gnosis, the moon of innate joy. Its good light is the form of great bliss. That which has that is explained in that way.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma gcig nyid kyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'jig rten gsum bde ba chen por gsal ba'i dngos por yang dag par brtson pa gang yin pa de brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma gcig nyid kyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'jig rten gsum bde ba chen por gsal ba'i dngos por yang dag par brtson pa gang yin pa de brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste'o //
translated: That which is the exertion of the single moon and sun, the net of illusions, the manifestation of the three worlds as great bliss, is the great exertion, the net of illusions.

original: rgyud kun ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la sogs pa'i rgyud chen po rnams so //
analyzed: rgyud kun ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la sogs pa'i rgyud chen po rnams so //
translated: All tantras are the great tantras such as the Yoga Tantra.

original: de rnams kho na'i bstan bya nyid kyi phyir rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po ste de yang mchog go //
analyzed: de rnams kho na'i bstan bya nyid kyi phyir rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po ste de yang mchog go //
translated: Because it is the very object of instruction of those, it is the lord of all tantras, and that is supreme.

original: srog dang thur sel nye bar 'gog pas gnyis su med par gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi gdan ma lus pa dang ldan pa gang gi yin pa 'di rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus gdan no //
analyzed: srog dang thur sel nye bar 'gog pas gnyis su med par gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi gdan ma lus pa dang ldan pa gang gi yin pa 'di rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus gdan no //
translated: The vajra seat is the seat of all, which is the vajra-like concentration that has become nondual by the cessation of the life-force and the evacuative wind.

original: lus pa med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku mchog tu gnyis su med par gyur pa 'chang ba ni ye shes sku ni ma lus 'chang ngo //üîΩdu ba la sogs pa'i rtags gsal ba'i dngos pos kun du bzang po lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: lus pa med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku mchog tu gnyis su med par gyur pa 'chang ba ni ye shes sku ni ma lus 'chang ngo // du ba la sogs pa'i rtags gsal ba'i dngos pos kun du bzang po lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: The one who holds the supreme wisdom body of the Buddhas without exception, who is nondual, is the one who holds the wisdom body without exception.

original: rnam par rtog pa thams cad med pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa nyid kyi stong ba nyid kyi rnam pa'i bro gros bzang po gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams cad med pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa nyid kyi stong ba nyid kyi rnam pa'i bro gros bzang po gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: The one who has the good counsel of emptiness, which is the attainment of perfect enlightenment itself, because of the absence of all conceptual thought, is just that.

original: sa'i sgras 'byung ba lnga nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir sa'i snying po rgyu ste ;
analyzed: sa'i sgras 'byung ba lnga nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir sa'i snying po rgyu ste ;
translated: The one who is the essence of the earth, because the five elements are illustrated by the word ‚Äúearth,‚Äù

original: sa'i snying po lhan cig pa'i dga' ba'i thig le'o //
analyzed: sa'i snying po lhan cig pa'i dga' ba'i thig le'o //
translated: is the essence of the earth, which is the bindu of innate joy.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'gro ba 'dzin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'gro ba 'dzin te /
translated: For that very reason, he holds the world,

original: 'gro ba mtha' dag gi gzhi'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba mtha' dag gi gzhi'o //
translated: because he is the ground of all the world.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi ste dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sbyor ba yan lag drug sgom pa po rnams kyi skye ba'i rgyu yi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po @79a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi ste dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sbyor ba yan lag drug sgom pa po rnams kyi skye ba'i rgyu yi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po @79a * //
translated: Because it is the cause of the birth of all the buddhas, that is, of those who meditate on the six-branched yoga of the buddhas of the three times, it is the essence of all the buddhas.

original: che ste ; lhan cig skyes pa'i byang sems rdo rje'o //
analyzed: che ste ; lhan cig skyes pa'i byang sems rdo rje'o //
translated: It is great, that is, the coemergent bodhicitta-vajra.

original: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha spro ba sprul pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha spro ba sprul pa ste /
translated: The emanation of mundane and supramundane deities is the emanation wheel.

original: de nyid 'khor lo sna tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de nyid 'khor lo sna tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: That itself is the various ma·πá·∏çala wheels.

original: de 'dzin pa sbrul pa'i 'khor lo 'chang ste /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa sbrul pa'i 'khor lo 'chang ste /
translated: The holder of that is the emanation wheel holder.

original: khu ba dang rdul gnyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus dang ngag dang sems 'chang ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: khu ba dang rdul gnyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus dang ngag dang sems 'chang ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúholding the semen and the ovum united as one, the outer and inner body, speech, and mind‚Äù is that.

original: dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku'o //
translated: The pure nature of all things is the gnosis body of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: de yang 'di yin la mchog kyang yin pas /
analyzed: de yang 'di yin la mchog kyang yin pas /
translated: That is this and is also supreme,

original: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog go //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog go //
translated: so it is the supreme nature of all things.

original: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa gnyis su med par gyur pa sprul pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag med pa 'dzin pas na dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin to //
analyzed: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa gnyis su med par gyur pa sprul pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag med pa 'dzin pas na dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin to //
translated: Since it holds the nature of all things, which is the characteristic of the emanation that is nondual with the dharmakƒÅya and the sa·πÉbhogakƒÅya, it holds the nature of all things.

original: skye med rang bzhin med pa de kho na nyid kyi chos gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: skye med rang bzhin med pa de kho na nyid kyi chos gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: The nature of nonarising and nonexistence is the dharmatƒÅ.

original: sna tshogs kyi don bsgrub bya mngon par 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi don bsgrub bya mngon par 'dod par bya'o //
translated: The various objects to be accomplished should be desired.

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa'i chos kun gyi ngo bo nyid yang dag ba ji lta ba shes pa 'chang bas na chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa'i chos kun gyi ngo bo nyid yang dag ba ji lta ba shes pa 'chang bas na chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba'o //
translated: Since it holds the nature of all phenomena, such as the aggregates, elements, and sense bases, just as they are, it holds the nature of all phenomena.

original: shes rab chen po rlung nyi khri tshig stong drug brgya bde ba chen po gcig tu thim pa'i blo dang ldan zhes pa'i don to /
analyzed: shes rab chen po rlung nyi khri tshig stong drug brgya bde ba chen po gcig tu thim pa'i blo dang ldan zhes pa'i don to /
translated: It is endowed with the great wisdom that dissolves the twenty-one thousand six hundred prƒÅ·πáas into one great bliss.

original: skad cig bzhi pa 'das pa'i dga' ba bzhi gcig tu gyur pa'i sku lhan cig skyes pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gcig gnyis su med pa de la'o //
analyzed: skad cig bzhi pa 'das pa'i dga' ba bzhi gcig tu gyur pa'i sku lhan cig skyes pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gcig gnyis su med pa de la'o //
translated: In that, the fourth moment, the four joys are one, the body is coemergent, and the characteristic of perfect enlightenment is nondual.

original: 'dis kyang bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam dpal dga' ba bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: 'dis kyang bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam dpal dga' ba bzhi pa'o /
translated: This also is the glorious BhagavƒÅn Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´‚Äôs four joys.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As is said:

original: rdo rje'i sa bon 'bab pas bkrus dag pa //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sa bon 'bab pas bkrus dag pa //
translated: The vajra seed is washed by the falling water,

original: chu sbyin 'byung ba'i myu gur gyur pa rgyas /
analyzed: chu sbyin 'byung ba'i myu gur gyur pa rgyas /
translated: and the sprout of the water offering grows.

original: rab gsal bzhi pa mkhas pa la yang zab //
analyzed: rab gsal bzhi pa mkhas pa la yang zab //
translated: The fourth is clear and also profound for the wise,

original: bzhi pa lo tog yongs su smin par 'gyur //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bzhi pa lo tog yongs su smin par 'gyur // zhes gsungs so //
translated: and the fourth is the ripening of the harvest.

original: chos kun te dbugs kun khong du chud pa bde ba gcig tu thim pa khong du chud par 'chang bas na chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang ngo //
analyzed: chos kun te dbugs kun khong du chud pa bde ba gcig tu thim pa khong du chud par 'chang bas na chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang ngo //
translated: The one who holds the realization of all phenomena is the one who holds the realization of the single dissolution of bliss.

original: chos kun rdul mun pa snying stobs rnams mngon par rtogs par mngon sum du bya ba ste /
analyzed: chos kun rdul mun pa snying stobs rnams mngon par rtogs par mngon sum du bya ba ste /
translated: The realization of all phenomena is the direct realization of rajas, tamas, and sattva.

original: lhan skyes zla ba las byung ba nyid kyis gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: lhan skyes zla ba las byung ba nyid kyis gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: The one who has that which arises from the coemergent moon is just that.

original: yang dag par bden pa bde bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag par bden pa bde bzhin nyid do //
translated: The reality of the truth of the real is suchness.

original: de'i mtha' rab tu gyur pa'i 'bras bu'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: de'i mtha' rab tu gyur pa'i 'bras bu'i gnas skabs so //
translated: Its end is the state of the fruit of the transformation.

original: de'i thub pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pas yang dag @79b mtha'i thub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i thub pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pas yang dag @79b mtha'i thub pa'o //
translated: Its sage is the sage of the end of the real, because he has understood it as it is.

original: blo mchog rdo rje'i rtse mor bde ba khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo mchog rdo rje'i rtse mor bde ba khong du chud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he has understood the bliss at the tip of the vajra, the supreme mind.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i bde bas tshim par byed bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i bde bas tshim par byed bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: It is immovable because it is satisfied by the bliss of the innate.

original: ting nge 'dzin gsal ba'i dngos pos mi g-yo ba'i phyir rab tu dang ba'i bdag nyid rang bzhin gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gsal ba'i dngos pos mi g-yo ba'i phyir rab tu dang ba'i bdag nyid rang bzhin gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: It is just as it is, whose nature is clarity, because it is unmoved by the substance of concentration.

original: rdo rje nor bu'i nang du son pa'i sems rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu'i nang du son pa'i sems rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
translated: The mind that has entered into the vajra jewel is the perfect Buddha.

original: de'i byang chub bde ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de'i byang chub bde ba'i ye shes so //
translated: His enlightenment is the intuition of bliss.

original: de 'chang ba ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: de 'chang ba ni de bzhin no //
translated: He who holds that is just as he is.

original: rang gis rig par bya ba lhan skyes kyi ye shes sdu gu mchog dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa'o //
analyzed: rang gis rig par bya ba lhan skyes kyi ye shes sdu gu mchog dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa'o //
translated: The object of one‚Äôs awareness is the innate wisdom, the most beautiful, which is the direct experience of all the buddhas of the three times.üîΩ

original: ye shes me lce rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i dmigs su med pa'i ye shes kyi 'od rab tu gsal ba mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu gsal bar byed pa po'o //
analyzed: ye shes me lce rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i dmigs su med pa'i ye shes kyi 'od rab tu gsal ba mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu gsal bar byed pa po'o //
translated: The natural inner radiance of the flame of timeless awareness is the radiance of timeless awareness that is not an object, which is the source of the infinite and limitless illumination of the buddha realms.

original: 'di ni gtsug tor la sogs pa nas nor bu'i rtse mo'i bar gyi gnas bdun du sgrib pa med par byas pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / dbang po dang / yul dang / las kyi dbang po dang / las kyi dbang po'i bya ba ste drug po'i rnam par dag pas tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gtsug tor la sogs pa nas nor bu'i rtse mo'i bar gyi gnas bdun du sgrib pa med par byas pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / dbang po dang / yul dang / las kyi dbang po dang / las kyi dbang po'i bya ba ste drug po'i rnam par dag pas tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the discerning aspect of timeless awareness, in terms of the purity of the six aspects of the aggregates, the elements, the sense faculties, the objects, the faculties of action, and the activities of the faculties of action, which are unobscured in the seven locations, from the very crown of the head down to the glans penis, in forty-two verses.

original: da ni 'dod pa'i don sgrub ces pa la sogs pas sgrib pa med pa'i tshor ba'i phung po rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes de nyid gsungs ta /
analyzed: da ni 'dod pa'i don sgrub ces pa la sogs pas sgrib pa med pa'i tshor ba'i phung po rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes de nyid gsungs ta /
translated: Now, ‚Äúthe accomplishment of the desired aim‚Äù and so forth explain the aggregate of feeling, which is free of obscuration, the essence of Ratnasa·πÉbha, from the perspective of the gnosis of uniformity, that very coemergent gnosis.

original: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa po mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes kyi gzugs kyi phyir 'dod pa yang 'di yin la /
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa po mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes kyi gzugs kyi phyir 'dod pa yang 'di yin la /
translated: Since it is the supreme cause of the accomplishment of all wishes, it is the supreme unchanging gnosis of form.

original: don yang yin pas 'dod pa'i don to //
analyzed: don yang yin pas 'dod pa'i don to //
translated: Since it is both desired and an aim, it is the desired aim.

original: de'i sgrub byed rdzogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sgrub byed rdzogs par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the accomplishment of its means of accomplishment.

original: rdo rje dang padma'i nang du chud pa'i thig le gsum las 'das pa'i phyir dam pa ste'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma'i nang du chud pa'i thig le gsum las 'das pa'i phyir dam pa ste'o //
translated: Since it is beyond the three bindus that are within the vajra and lotus, it is sublime.

original: 'khor ba'i bag chags ngan song thams cad kyi rnam sbyong ba bde ba chen po gcig tu byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i bag chags ngan song thams cad kyi rnam sbyong ba bde ba chen po gcig tu byed pa'o //
translated: It is the single great bliss that purifies all the bad migrations of samsara.

original: lus dang ngag dang sems sems can kun gyi mchog ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang sems sems can kun gyi mchog ye shes kyi sku'o //
translated: It is the supreme of all sentient beings‚Äô bodies, voices, and minds, the gnosis body.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon no //
translated: Therefore, he is the protector of the unprotected.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i padma rgyas pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad rab grol byed do //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i padma rgyas pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad rab grol byed do //
translated: He is the liberator of all beings, because the lotus of the great seal is opened.

original: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa nyon mongs pa rnams yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi mtshon gyis gcod pa'i phyir nyon mongs g-yul du gcig gnyis su med pa'i dpa' @80a * //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa nyon mongs pa rnams yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi mtshon gyis gcod pa'i phyir nyon mongs g-yul du gcig gnyis su med pa'i dpa' @80a * //
translated: He is the hero in the battle with the afflictions, because he cuts the afflictions of all beings with the sword of correct knowledge.

original: bo'o ; / sgra gzhan du bkod pa ni gtsug lag yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bo'o ; / sgra gzhan du bkod pa ni gtsug lag yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The other reading of the Sanskrit is preferable, because it is traditional.

original: mi shes pa ma rig pa de nyid dgra ste /
analyzed: mi shes pa ma rig pa de nyid dgra ste /
translated: Ignorance is the enemy,

original: 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal ster ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal ster ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it gives rise to the suffering of transmigration.

original: de'i dregs pa phyi rol du rnam par 'phos pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dregs pa phyi rol du rnam par 'phos pa'o //
translated: Its pride is the external transformation.

original: de snang ba med par byed pa'i phyir mi shes dgra'i dregs pa 'joms so ;
analyzed: de snang ba med par byed pa'i phyir mi shes dgra'i dregs pa 'joms so ;
translated: He destroys the pride of the enemy, ignorance, because he makes it inapprehensible.

original: / sems tsam yang spangs pas nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir blo ldan no //
analyzed: / sems tsam yang spangs pas nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir blo ldan no //
translated: He is the wise one, because he is free from afflictions and secondary afflictions, since he has abandoned even the idea of mind only.

original: chos nyid kyi brdas sgeg ba lhan skyes kyi dga' ba'i khu ba'o //
analyzed: chos nyid kyi brdas sgeg ba lhan skyes kyi dga' ba'i khu ba'o //
translated: The essence of reality is the semen of innate bliss.

original: de 'chad ba'i phyir de bzhin no //
analyzed: de 'chad ba'i phyir de bzhin no //
translated: The meaning of that is as follows.

original: gtsug nas 'bab pa'i byang chub sems kyi rgyun gyis lus thams cad gzi mdangs can du byas pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa ni dpal ldan no //
analyzed: gtsug nas 'bab pa'i byang chub sems kyi rgyun gyis lus thams cad gzi mdangs can du byas pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa ni dpal ldan no //
translated: The body is made radiant by the stream of bodhicitta flowing from the crown, and thus it is endowed with mundane and supramundane perfections, and so it is glorious.

original: thabs ni snying rje'i yan lag gi phyir dpa' bo'i nyams nyid de /
analyzed: thabs ni snying rje'i yan lag gi phyir dpa' bo'i nyams nyid de /
translated: Skill in means is the aspect of compassion, and so it is the experience of heroism.

original: shes rab ni stong pa nyid kyi yan lag nyid kyi sdug pa'i nyams nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab ni stong pa nyid kyi yan lag nyid kyi sdug pa'i nyams nyid do //
translated: Wisdom is the aspect of emptiness, and so it is the experience of beauty.

original: de dag gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo bde ba chen po ni dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs te de 'dzin pa ni de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de dag gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo bde ba chen po ni dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs te de 'dzin pa ni de de bzhin no //
translated: The essence of their nonduality is great bliss, and so it is the experience of the beautiful form of the hero.

original: lag pa srog dang thur sel gyi rlung gi rgyud gnyis so //
analyzed: lag pa srog dang thur sel gyi rlung gi rgyud gnyis so //
translated: The two channels are the life-force and the downward-clearing winds.

original: de g-yon dang g-yas kyi sna bug gi dkyil 'khor bcu 'pho ba'i dbye bas mtha' yas pa'i phyir rgya'o //
analyzed: de g-yon dang g-yas kyi sna bug gi dkyil 'khor bcu 'pho ba'i dbye bas mtha' yas pa'i phyir rgya'o //
translated: They are infinite because they are the ten ma·πá·∏çalas that move through the left and right nostrils.

original: de bskyod pa bcug pa ste dbu mar bcug pas bum pa can gyi gnas skabs kyi rlung gi tshogs so //
analyzed: de bskyod pa bcug pa ste dbu mar bcug pas bum pa can gyi gnas skabs kyi rlung gi tshogs so //
translated: That is the wind-aggregate in the state of the vase-breathing, by the insertion of it, i.e. of the breath, into the central channel.

original: de'i gom pas bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ste /
analyzed: de'i gom pas bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ste /
translated: By that step, i.e. by the vase-breathing, the state of supreme bliss is attained.

original: stobs thim par byed pa'o //
analyzed: stobs thim par byed pa'o //
translated: It causes the dissolution of the forces.

original: des sam de ru gar byed pa bde ba kha bye ba gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: des sam de ru gar byed pa bde ba kha bye ba gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: By that, or in that, the dance of the bliss that is opened is just as it is.

original: mchog tu mi 'gyur par bsgyur pa'i rlung gi tshogs nyid kyi dpal ldan te /
analyzed: mchog tu mi 'gyur par bsgyur pa'i rlung gi tshogs nyid kyi dpal ldan te /
translated: The wind-aggregate, which is transformed into the supreme immutable, is glorious.

original: rgya gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'pho ba mtha' med pa'o //
analyzed: rgya gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'pho ba mtha' med pa'o //
translated: It is the nondual intuition, the endless transference.

original: de za bar byed pa'i dpal ldan lag pa brgya ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: de za bar byed pa'i dpal ldan lag pa brgya ye shes kyi sku'o //
translated: The glorious one with a hundred arms, who consumes that, is the intuition-body.

original: de gang brgya che ba yongs su rgyas pa 'di'i yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de gang brgya che ba yongs su rgyas pa 'di'i yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: That which is filled with his hundredfold greatness is just as it is.

original: dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du chud pa'i phyir nam mkha' khyab par te /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du chud pa'i phyir nam mkha' khyab par te /
translated: Because all things are included in the nature of emptiness, it is the pervasion of space.

original: khyab pa nyid der bde ba chen pos gar byed pa rab tu gnas pa gang yin pa de de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: khyab pa nyid der bde ba chen pos gar byed pa rab tu gnas pa gang yin pa de de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: The dance of the great bliss that abides in that pervasion is just as it is explained.

original: sa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i khyon lte ba'i 'og rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor gnas pa rdul dang byang sems gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: sa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i khyon lte ba'i 'og rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor gnas pa rdul dang byang sems gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: The extent of the four ma·πá·∏çalas of the earth is the extent of the vajra jewel at the base of the navel, which is either semen or menstrual blood.

original: yi ge la phyis te bstan pa ni @80b gtsug lag yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge la phyis te bstan pa ni @80b gtsug lag yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The teaching of the syllables is the sacred teaching.

original: yang nas ni stong pa nyid de khu ba sa bon 'dzin pa'i phyir de'i dkyil 'khor snying po zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang nas ni stong pa nyid de khu ba sa bon 'dzin pa'i phyir de'i dkyil 'khor snying po zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Again, the ma·πá·∏çala of the empty space is the essence of the ma·πá·∏çala, because the semen holds the seed.

original: rkang ba ya gcig mthil gnyis su med pa rab tu gnas pa'i gzugs kyis mnan te brtan par byas pas rtogs par byas pa'o //
analyzed: rkang ba ya gcig mthil gnyis su med pa rab tu gnas pa'i gzugs kyis mnan te brtan par byas pas rtogs par byas pa'o //
translated: The sole foot is pressed down with the form of the two soles, which is the realization of the nondual abiding.

original: rkang mtheb sen mo bzlog pa'i rim pas gtsug tor du son pa rdo rje dang 'brel pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: rkang mtheb sen mo bzlog pa'i rim pas gtsug tor du son pa rdo rje dang 'brel pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The bodhicitta connected with the vajra is the crown, which is reached by the process of reversing the nail of the big toe.

original: de gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas gnas pa khyon no //
analyzed: de gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas gnas pa khyon no //
translated: The extent is the abiding of the union of those two.

original: tshangs pa'i yul sa'i rtse tshangs pa'i bu ga'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i yul sa'i rtse tshangs pa'i bu ga'o //
translated: The crown of the realm of BrahmƒÅ is the aperture of BrahmƒÅ.

original: de gnon pa gang yin pa 'di'o //
analyzed: de gnon pa gang yin pa 'di'o //
translated: This is the pressing down of that.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: And it is said:

original: zhabs gcig rdo rje nor bu'i rdul ni nyi ma ste ;
analyzed: zhabs gcig rdo rje nor bu'i rdul ni nyi ma ste ;
translated: One foot is the sun, the dust of the vajra gem,

original: / spyi gtsug khu ba ri bong can ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: / spyi gtsug khu ba ri bong can ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: and the top of the head is the moon, the semen, the rabbit.

original: bkod pa rtag tu mi phyed dbyer med 'dod bdag po //
analyzed: bkod pa rtag tu mi phyed dbyer med 'dod bdag po //
translated: The configuration is always indivisible, the lord of the indivisible,

original: 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: and one should bow one's head to the one worshipped by the three worlds.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: bdag po byang chub kyi sems rdo je dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i ngo bo'i zhabs bgrod par bya ba dang rtogs par bya bas na mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: bdag po byang chub kyi sems rdo je dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i ngo bo'i zhabs bgrod par bya ba dang rtogs par bya bas na mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The lord is the bodhicitta, the essence of the glorious Wheel of Time, Vajrapani. Because one should go to his feet and realize him, it is unchanging wisdom.

original: de bkod pa ma rig pa dgag pa'i phyir rdo rje nor bur rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa rdul nyi ma sa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i khyon ye shes kyi khams su gang bskrun pa'i g-yas rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon no //
analyzed: de bkod pa ma rig pa dgag pa'i phyir rdo rje nor bur rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa rdul nyi ma sa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i khyon ye shes kyi khams su gang bskrun pa'i g-yas rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon no //
translated: In order to block the configuration, which is ignorance, the dust of the earth of the stage of nonabiding nirvana in the vajra gem, the rabbit, the semen, the moon, the one who fills the realm of wisdom with the extent of the four ma·πá·∏çalas of the earth, the sun, the right foot is pressed down with the sole.

original: gtsug tor las byung ba'i bde ba 'das pa'i khu ba zla ba rkang mtheb sen mo sngar 'dod pa'i cha 'char ba'i bdag nyid rnam par shes pa'i khams su gnyis pa gang g-yon pa ni tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon no //
analyzed: gtsug tor las byung ba'i bde ba 'das pa'i khu ba zla ba rkang mtheb sen mo sngar 'dod pa'i cha 'char ba'i bdag nyid rnam par shes pa'i khams su gnyis pa gang g-yon pa ni tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon no //
translated: The essence of the moon, which is the bodhicitta that arises from the crown, is the element of consciousness, which is the nature of the arising of the previously mentioned part of desire.

original: rtag tu dus gsum du nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las 'das pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtag tu dus gsum du nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las 'das pa'i phyir /
translated: It is always beyond the obscurations of the three times.

original: ma rig pa mi shes pa'i gri gug gis mi chod pa'o //üîΩrnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las 'das pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma rig pa mi shes pa'i gri gug gis mi chod pa'o // rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las 'das pa'i phyir /
translated: It is not cut by the sword of ignorance.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtse mos dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtse mos dbyer med pa'o //
translated: It is indivisible by the tip of subject and object because it is beyond the dharmatƒÅ of consciousness.

original: bde ba chen po'i ngo bo'i phyir 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i ngo bo'i phyir 'dod pa'o //
translated: It is desire because it is the nature of great bliss.

original: bya ba byas pas skam sa nor bur gnas pa'o //üîΩ'jig rten gyi spyod pa las 'das pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: bya ba byas pas skam sa nor bur gnas pa'o // 'jig rten gyi spyod pa las 'das pa'i phyir ;
translated: It is the jewel that abides in the dry land because it has completed its activity.üîΩIt is the supreme offering of the three worlds because it is beyond worldly conduct.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod pa 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar gtsug tor du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod pa 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar gtsug tor du gnas pa'o //
translated: It abides in the crown as the perfection of the other side of sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas las kyang /
analyzed: dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas las kyang /
translated: Also, in the ≈örƒ´ Paramadya Tantra:

original: srog dang rtsol ba'i me yis ri bong can yang zhu ba'i btung ba chang gi btung ba'o //
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba'i me yis ri bong can yang zhu ba'i btung ba chang gi btung ba'o //
translated: The wine-drinking is the drinking of the wine of the melted moon by the fire of the prƒÅ·πáa and ƒÅyƒÅma.

original: gtsug tor dag tu mthe bo'i tshigs nas 'gro ste tshes kyi dbang @81a * //
analyzed: gtsug tor dag tu mthe bo'i tshigs nas 'gro ste tshes kyi dbang @81a * //
translated: The moon moves from the finger-joints to the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a by the power of the lunar days.

original: gis nya'i mtha' ni rang gi sems //
analyzed: gis nya'i mtha' ni rang gi sems //
translated: At the end of the new moon, one‚Äôs own mind

original: gtsug tor nas ni mthe bong rnams su slar yang 'gro ste nag po'i phyogs kyi mthar thug bar //
analyzed: gtsug tor nas ni mthe bong rnams su slar yang 'gro ste nag po'i phyogs kyi mthar thug bar //
translated: moves from the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a to the finger-joints again, until the end of the dark half.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi spyod pa de ni nyin zhag so sor dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi spyod pa de ni nyin zhag so sor dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster //
translated: That conduct of the yoginƒ´s bestows the desired power at the proper time in each day.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi dbye ba med pa'i phyir don gcig go //
analyzed: don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi dbye ba med pa'i phyir don gcig go //
translated: It is of one meaning because of the absence of a division of ultimate reality.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma dag dbu mar zhugs pa la chos gnyis med pa'i phyir gnyis med chos kyi ye shes kyi zla ba rab tu rgyas pa'i don to //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma dag dbu mar zhugs pa la chos gnyis med pa'i phyir gnyis med chos kyi ye shes kyi zla ba rab tu rgyas pa'i don to //
translated: It is the meaning of the full moon of the gnosis of nondual reality because of the nonduality of the moon and sun entering the central nƒÅ·∏çƒ´.

original: dogs pa thams cad bcom pa'i phyir dam pa'i don to //
analyzed: dogs pa thams cad bcom pa'i phyir dam pa'i don to //
translated: It is the ultimate meaning because of the destruction of all doubts.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan gyi thig le'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir 'jigs pa med do //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan gyi thig le'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir 'jigs pa med do //
translated: It is fearless because of the nature of the bindu of space-like concentration.

original: nam mkha' bzhin du chos nyid kyi ngo bos kun gzhi dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo dpe med pa'i chos kyi don bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur pa ni rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can no //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du chos nyid kyi ngo bos kun gzhi dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo dpe med pa'i chos kyi don bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur pa ni rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can no //
translated: Like space, the nature of reality is the meaning of the Dharma that is beyond example, the nature of the all-basis, the afflicted mind, the engaging consciousness, and so on.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i mun pa thams cad sangs pa nyid kyis sems med pa'i sems snying rje'i rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i mun pa thams cad sangs pa nyid kyis sems med pa'i sems snying rje'i rgyud kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan no //
translated: The meaning of the mind is the mind that is without mind, the nature of the continuum of compassion, and the continuum of consciousness.

original: dngos po ma lus pa kho na gsal bar gyur pa'i lhan skyes nyid kyi don te /
analyzed: dngos po ma lus pa kho na gsal bar gyur pa'i lhan skyes nyid kyi don te /
translated: The meaning of the innate is the clarity of all things without exception.

original: de las dga' ba dpe med pa'i dga' ba 'di'o //
analyzed: de las dga' ba dpe med pa'i dga' ba 'di'o //
translated: This is the joy that is beyond example.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As such, it is said:

original: kho bo yul ni 'di de yid kyi 'jug pa lnga yi skad cig 'di nyid dang // zhen pa dang ldan dbang po'i stobs ni nyon mongs rgyas pa'i sa bon 'di nyid ni //
analyzed: kho bo yul ni 'di de yid kyi 'jug pa lnga yi skad cig 'di nyid dang // zhen pa dang ldan dbang po'i stobs ni nyon mongs rgyas pa'i sa bon 'di nyid ni //
translated: this very ground of the seed of the afflictions, the power of the senses with their attachments.

original: bla ma dam pa'i zhabs rdul gang zhig reg pa'i dbang gis rang nyid 'di dag ni //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa'i zhabs rdul gang zhig reg pa'i dbang gis rang nyid 'di dag ni //
translated: By the power of touching the dust on the feet of the holy guru,

original: bdag la snying po nyid ni de nyid bdud rtsi nyin bzhin 'bab 'gyur phyag byar 'os ;üîΩ/ zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bdag la snying po nyid ni de nyid bdud rtsi nyin bzhin 'bab 'gyur phyag byar 'os ; / zhes gsungs so //
translated: I am worthy of homage, for the nectar of the essence itself flows in me daily.

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid khong du chud pas stong pa nyid dga'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid khong du chud pas stong pa nyid dga'o //
translated: He delights in emptiness, for he has realized the suchness, the nature of all phenomena.

original: mtha' gnyis su ma ltung ba'i phyir blo mchog go //
analyzed: mtha' gnyis su ma ltung ba'i phyir blo mchog go //
translated: He has the highest mind, for he has not fallen into the two extremes.

original: chags pa dang chags bral dang / dbu ma'i chags pa dang rang bzhin gyis bral ba'i phyir srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs spangs pa'o ;
analyzed: chags pa dang chags bral dang / dbu ma'i chags pa dang rang bzhin gyis bral ba'i phyir srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs spangs pa'o ;
translated: He has abandoned the attachments of existence, and so forth, for he is naturally free from attachment and aversion and the middle way of attachment.

original: / srid gsum lus ngag sems gcig tu 'dres pa'i dngos po'i bde ba chen po tha mal pa'i dga' ba'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i dga' ba chen po 'di'i yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: / srid gsum lus ngag sems gcig tu 'dres pa'i dngos po'i bde ba chen po tha mal pa'i dga' ba'i bdag nyid ma yin pa'i dga' ba chen po 'di'i yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: The great bliss of the single entity of body, speech, and mind of the three worlds is the great joy that is not the nature of ordinary joy.

original: ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba'i phyir dang / dag pa khams thams cad kyi khu ba'i phyir sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du @81b dkar ba'o //
analyzed: ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba'i phyir dang / dag pa khams thams cad kyi khu ba'i phyir sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du @81b dkar ba'o //
translated: It is white like the autumn moon, and like a white cloud, it is pure, being the essence of all pure elements.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis ma rig pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir dag pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis ma rig pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir dag pa'o //
translated: It is pure because it is the nature of Vajrasattva, free from the stain of ignorance.

original: bag chags tsam yang med pa'i phyir ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od lta bu'i 'od bzang bo gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bag chags tsam yang med pa'i phyir ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od lta bu'i 'od bzang bo gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: It has good light, like the light of the autumn moon, because it is free from even the mere latent tendencies.

original: chags pa chen po rdo rjes su chags pa las /
analyzed: chags pa chen po rdo rjes su chags pa las /
translated: From the great passion of the vajra,

original: srog dang thur sel gnyis kha sbyor gyi dbang gis de'i bdag nyid kyi sems nyi ma 'char ka lta bur snang bas na /
analyzed: srog dang thur sel gnyis kha sbyor gyi dbang gis de'i bdag nyid kyi sems nyi ma 'char ka lta bur snang bas na /
translated: the life-force and the downward-voiding [vƒÅyus] unite, and the mind, which is of their nature, appears like the rising sun.

original: nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba gang gi yin pa'am /
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba gang gi yin pa'am /
translated: Because of the beauty of the rising sun‚Äôs orb, or

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i gtum mo'i 'od zer gyis kun nas 'khyud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i gtum mo'i 'od zer gyis kun nas 'khyud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of being embraced by the light rays of innate gtum mo.

original: bde ba chen pos rkang pa'i mthe bong gi sen mo'i bar du khyab pa'i phyir sen mo'i bar du shas cher dmar ba'i 'od kyi snang ba bde bas khyab pa byang sems rgyal po 'di'i yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bde ba chen pos rkang pa'i mthe bong gi sen mo'i bar du khyab pa'i phyir sen mo'i bar du shas cher dmar ba'i 'od kyi snang ba bde bas khyab pa byang sems rgyal po 'di'i yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: Because of being pervaded by the bliss of great bliss up to the nails of the toes, the pervasion of the light of the intense red of the nails with bliss is of this king of bodhicitta.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa lhan skyes kyi mthon ka 'pho ba'i phyir mthon ka byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa lhan skyes kyi mthon ka 'pho ba'i phyir mthon ka byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Because of the movement of the extremely pure innate ma·πá·∏çala, the ma·πá·∏çala of bodhicitta.

original: de'i rtse mo bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: de'i rtse mo bde ba chen po'o //
translated: Its peak is great bliss.

original: de'i cod pan bzang po mchog lta bu'i 'od 'di'i yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i cod pan bzang po mchog lta bu'i 'od 'di'i yin pa de de bzhin no //
