analyzed: chags pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyor bas 'dzag pa'i bag chag za ba'i phyir / nyon mongs mi shes g-yul ngo sel lo //
translated: The mind is the bow because it is the basis of the arrow.üîΩThe arrow is the mind because it is the basis of the bow.üîΩThe mind is the bow because it is the basis of the arrow.üîΩThe arrow is the mind because it is the basis of the bow.üîΩThe mind is the bow because it is the basis of the arrow.üîΩThe arrow is the mind because it is the basis of the bow.üîΩThe mind is the bow because it is the basis of the arrow.üîΩThe arrow is the mind because it is the basis of the bow.üîΩThe mind is the bow because it is the basis of the arrow.üîΩThe arrow is the mind because it is the basis of the bow.üîΩThe mind is the bow because it is the basis of the arrow.üîΩThe arrow is the mind because it is the basis of the bow.üîΩThe mind is the bow because it is the basis of the arrow.üîΩThe arrow is the mind because it is the basis of the bow.üîΩThe mind is the bow because it is the basis of the arrow.üîΩThe arrow is the mind because it is the basis of the bow.üîΩThe mind is the bow because it is the basis of the arrow.üîΩThe arrow is the mind because it is the basis of the bow.üîΩThe mind is the bow because it is the basis of the arrow.üîΩThe arrow is the mind because it is the basis of the bow.

original: 'od gsal rin chen gyis non pa'i lus ngag sems kyis chags pa nyid kyis bdud dgra'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal rin chen gyis non pa'i lus ngag sems kyis chags pa nyid kyis bdud dgra'o //
translated: The mind is the bow because it is the basis of the arrow.üîΩThe arrow is the mind because it

original: rdo rje'i gdan nyid kyis srog dang thur sel 'gog pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ste mi 'pham pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gdan nyid kyis srog dang thur sel 'gog pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ste mi 'pham pa'o //
translated: He is the conqueror of demons, i.e., invincible, because he blocks the life and downward-voiding winds at the vajra seat itself.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dpa' bo'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dpa' bo'o //
translated: He is the hero for that very reason.

original: byams pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir sad pa dang ; rmi lam dang / gnyid log pa dang / bzhi pa mi zad pa'i phyir bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed do //
analyzed: byams pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir sad pa dang ; rmi lam dang / gnyid log pa dang / bzhi pa mi zad pa'i phyir bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed do //
translated: He is the dispeller of the fear of the four demons because he is awake, i.e., in the state of love, etc., and because he is in the fourth state, i.e., in the state of dream, deep sleep, and the fourth, which is imperishable.

original: rang bzhin gyi dri ma med pa'i rang byin gyis brlab pa nyid kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams 'pham byed pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi dri ma med pa'i rang byin gyis brlab pa nyid kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams 'pham byed pa'o //
translated: He is the conqueror of the hosts of demons because he is naturally stainless and because he is self-consecration.

original: dkyil 'khor drug gi bdag po yin pa'i phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor drug gi bdag po yin pa'i phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
translated: He is the perfect Buddha because he is the lord of the six centers.

original: srid pa'i 'dod chags kyi sred pa'i dri ma spangs pa'i phyir 'jig rten 'dren no //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'dod chags kyi sred pa'i dri ma spangs pa'i phyir 'jig rten 'dren no //
translated: He is the leader of the world because he has abandoned the stain of craving, i.e., the desire for existence.

original: grub mtha' thams cad kyi pha rol du son pa nyid kyis mchod 'os so //
analyzed: grub mtha' thams cad kyi pha rol du son pa nyid kyis mchod 'os so //
translated: He is worthy of offerings because he has reached the other shore of all philosophical positions.

original: gzhom du med pa'i n'a da la brten pa'i dam pa'i chos thams cad gsung ba nyid kyis mchod par 'os pa'i phyir bstod 'os so //
analyzed: gzhom du med pa'i n'a da la brten pa'i dam pa'i chos thams cad gsung ba nyid kyis mchod par 'os pa'i phyir bstod 'os so //
translated: It is worthy of praise, because it is worthy of worship by all the good Dharma, which is based on the imperishable nada.

original: dge ba'i stegs ye shes su zhugs pas ma rig pa la sogs pa'i dri ma bkrus pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi phyag bya bar 'os pa'i phyir phyag gi gnas so //
analyzed: dge ba'i stegs ye shes su zhugs pas ma rig pa la sogs pa'i dri ma bkrus pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi phyag bya bar 'os pa'i phyir phyag gi gnas so //
translated: It is worthy of worship, because it is worthy of salutation by the world with its gods, since it has washed away the stains of ignorance, etc., by entering into the wisdom of the vehicle of the good.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas chos 'byung gi nang du son pa nyid kyang byang chub ster ba po nyid kyi phyir nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyis rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas chos 'byung gi nang du son pa nyid kyang byang chub ster ba po nyid kyi phyir nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyis rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os so //
translated: It is always worthy of worship by the sravakas, etc., because it bestows enlightenment, even though it is situated in the Dharma-source, which is the five sense-qualities.

original: nyon mongs pa las rgyal ba nyid kyis yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bkur bar 'os pa'i mchog go //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa las rgyal ba nyid kyis yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bkur bar 'os pa'i mchog go //
translated: It is the best object of veneration for the bodhisattvas, because it is the perfection of all good qualities, since it is victorious over the afflictions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum nyid du gnyis su med pa'i bde ba khong du chud pa'i ngo bo @89b nyid kyi phyir rjed par bya ba'i mchog go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum nyid du gnyis su med pa'i bde ba khong du chud pa'i ngo bo @89b nyid kyi phyir rjed par bya ba'i mchog go //
translated: She is the supreme object of worship because she is the mother of all the Tathagatas, the very essence of the realization of nondual bliss.

original: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi bde ba dam pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir phyag byar 'os pa'o //
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi bde ba dam pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir phyag byar 'os pa'o //
translated: She is worthy of homage because she is the very nature of the highest bliss of those who practice the door of Secret Mantra.

original: sems can thams cad la bde ba chen po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs snying po la gnas pa'i phyir bla ma'i rab po //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la bde ba chen po'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs snying po la gnas pa'i phyir bla ma'i rab po //
translated: She is the supreme guru because she is the essence of the mind of all the Tathagatas, abiding in the form of great bliss for all sentient beings.

original: 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig gnyis su med pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bgrod pa nyams su myong ba 'am /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig gnyis su med pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bgrod pa nyams su myong ba 'am /
translated: She is the one who experiences the nondual single step of the three worlds, the experience of coemergent joy.

original: des bsgrod pa khyab pa ni 'di'o //
analyzed: des bsgrod pa khyab pa ni 'di'o //
translated: Or, she is the one who pervades that which is traversed by that.

original: mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rtsen pa gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
analyzed: mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rtsen pa gang gi yin pa de de bzhin no //
translated: She is the one who plays with the nature of coemergence, the infinite conqueror like space.

original: snang ba med pa 'pho ba'i ngo bo zhes pa'i mthar ro //
analyzed: snang ba med pa 'pho ba'i ngo bo zhes pa'i mthar ro //
translated: She is the one who is beyond appearances, the essence of movement.

original: rig pa gsum po 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrug pa po gang gi yin pa de de nyid gsum rig go //
analyzed: rig pa gsum po 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrug pa po gang gi yin pa de de nyid gsum rig go //
translated: He is one who knows the three knowledges, because he is one who seeks the powers of the knowledge of the three times and the knowledge of the great seal, and because he is one who is in the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.

original: thos pa tsam gyis kyang mchog tu bde bar byed pa nyid kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gtsang ma'o //
analyzed: thos pa tsam gyis kyang mchog tu bde bar byed pa nyid kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gtsang ma'o //
translated: He is pure, because he is extremely pure, since he is supremely blissful just through hearing.

original: bzhi pa'i ngo bos rtag tu 'byung ba'i phyir dag pa ni dag pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i ngo bos rtag tu 'byung ba'i phyir dag pa ni dag pa'o //
translated: He is pure, because he is always pure by nature.

original: de gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa gcig pa nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i ye shes can yin pa'i phyir mngon shes drug ldan no //
analyzed: de gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa gcig pa nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i ye shes can yin pa'i phyir mngon shes drug ldan no //
translated: He is one who has the six superknowledges, because he is one who has nondual knowledge, since he is one who has the identity of the one object of observation and the one wisdom.

original: 'khor lo drug gi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas spyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang dran pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir rjes dran drug go //
analyzed: 'khor lo drug gi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas spyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang dran pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir rjes dran drug go //
translated: He is one who has the six recollections, because he is one who has the nature of the retention and recollection of the perfections such as generosity, since he is one who has entered the meditative stabilization of the six wheels.

original: chos thams cad chags pa med pa theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad chags pa med pa theg pa chen po'o //
translated: The Great Vehicle is the nonattachment of all phenomena.

original: don khong du chud pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: don khong du chud pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: He is a bodhisattva, because he is one who has comprehended the meaning.

original: dpag tu med pa'i sems can tshim par byed pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: dpag tu med pa'i sems can tshim par byed pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: He is a great being because he satisfies immeasurable sentient beings.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'dod yon lnga la nye bar spyod pa'i bde bas sems can 'don pa'i nus pa chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul chen po'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'dod yon lnga la nye bar spyod pa'i bde bas sems can 'don pa'i nus pa chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul chen po'o //
translated: He is of great magic because he has the great power to deliver sentient beings by the bliss of enjoying the five sense-qualities which are inconceivable.

original: 'jig rten pa'i kun du rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir 'jig rten 'das so //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i kun du rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir 'jig rten 'das so //
translated: He is supramundane because he is free from mundane conceptual constructions.

original: zla ba bzang po nyid kyis dmigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: zla ba bzang po nyid kyis dmigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: He is the limit of the perfection of wisdom because he is free from the objective reference of the good moon itself.üîΩHe is the attainment of the nature of the great seal by wisdom.üîΩHe is self-aware because he is the nature of space by transcending all conceptual elaboration.üîΩHe is other-aware because he comprehends the non-duality of self and others.üîΩHe is the great hero because he is the hero of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is the great being because he is the great vehicle.üîΩHe is of great magic because he is the magic of the great vehicle.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'o //üîΩshes rab kyis ni de nyid phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin thob pa rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'o // shes rab kyis ni de nyid phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin thob pa rnyed pa'o //
translated: He is the limit of the perfection of wisdom because he is the wisdom of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is the attainment of the nature of the great seal because he is the seal of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is self-aware because he is the self-awareness of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is other-aware because he is the other-awareness of the great vehicle.

original: spros pa thams cad las 'das pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i ngo bo'i phyir bdag rig go //
analyzed: spros pa thams cad las 'das pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i ngo bo'i phyir bdag rig go //
translated: He is the great hero because he is the hero of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is the great being because he is the being of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is of great magic because he is the magic of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is the limit of the perfection of wisdom because he is the wisdom of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is the attainment of the nature of the great seal because he is the seal of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is self-aware because he is the self-awareness of the great vehicle.

original: rang gzhan dag gnyis su med par khong du chud pa'i phyir gzhan rig go //
analyzed: rang gzhan dag gnyis su med par khong du chud pa'i phyir gzhan rig go //
translated: He is other-aware because he is the other-awareness of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is the great hero because he is the hero of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is the great being because he is the being of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is of great magic because he is the magic of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is the limit of the perfection of wisdom because he is the wisdom of the great vehicle.

original: dngos po ma lus pa'i rang bzhin yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir @90a * //
analyzed: dngos po ma lus pa'i rang bzhin yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir @90a * //
translated: He is the attainment of the nature of the great seal because he is the seal of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is self-aware because he is the self-awareness of the great vehicle.üîΩHe is other-aware because he is the other-awareness of the great vehicle

original: thams cad pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad pa'o //
translated: He is all-pervading.

original: dngos po dang dngos med dag gnyis su byar med pa rtogs pas phan pa'i phyir kun la phan pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos med dag gnyis su byar med pa rtogs pas phan pa'i phyir kun la phan pa'o //
translated: He is the benefactor of all, because he benefits all by the realization of the non-duality of existence and non-existence.

original: bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyis ye shes kyi sku'i phyir gang zag mchog go //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyis ye shes kyi sku'i phyir gang zag mchog go //
translated: He is the supreme person, because he is the embodiment of the gnosis of the great bliss.

original: chos kyi sku dpe med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten pa'i dpe las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sku dpe med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten pa'i dpe las 'das pa'o //

original: lhan skyes nyid du so sor rang gis rig par bya ba'i phyir shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lhan skyes nyid du so sor rang gis rig par bya ba'i phyir shes par bya'o //

original: bde ba 'dzin pa po nyid kyis ye shes kyi bdag po'i phyir shes pa'i bdag po'o //
analyzed: bde ba 'dzin pa po nyid kyis ye shes kyi bdag po'i phyir shes pa'i bdag po'o //
translated: He is the lord of knowledge, because he is the embodiment of the gnosis which holds the bliss.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mchog go //üîΩsnod ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log pa'i chos ster pa'i phyir chos kyi sbyin bdag ste ;
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mchog go // snod ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log pa'i chos ster pa'i phyir chos kyi sbyin bdag ste ;

original: yid kyang gtong ba'i phyir chos kyis sbyin bdag nyid kyi gtso bo'o //
analyzed: yid kyang gtong ba'i phyir chos kyis sbyin bdag nyid kyi gtso bo'o //

original: las kyi phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i don ston pas gsal bar byed pa'o //

translated: That which is taught in the scriptures of the BhagavƒÅn is true.

analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas gnas par byas te /

analyzed: ji srid dpal phyag rgya chen po mngon du gyur pa de srid du'o //

original: phyag rgya yang yin pas te /

analyzed: chen po slar yang 'di rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa nyid de /

analyzed: phyogs gcig pa ma yin pa dang / byang sems rdo rje 'dis rgyas gdab par bya bas na phyag rgya'o //

original: rkyen ni 'dir rang gi sems kyis yongs su brtags pa'i chos dang bral bas du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma sngon du 'gro ba can rang gi sems kyi snang ba rnal 'byor pa'i bgrod bya pra phab pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: ji srid dam tshig gi phyag rgya mngon sum du bya ba'i bar de la 'khyud par bya'o //

original: 'jig pa med par mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i rang bzhin te /

original: de yang 'bras bu'i ngo bo phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: de yang 'bras bu'i ngo bo phyag rgya chen po'o //

original: mu dra mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i bde ba'i mtshan nyid kun nas brten pa dus thams cad du mi g-yo ba'i sbyor bas gang ba'i gnas skabs kun nas len pas na mu dra'o //

analyzed: de la spangs pa che ba ni /

original: 'dis ni lus dang ngag dang sems dang / ye shes kyi rnam par dag pa phyag rgya bzhi gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni lus dang ngag dang sems dang / ye shes kyi rnam par dag pa phyag rgya bzhi gsungs so //
